entry.def: If something that you buy is ready-made, you can use it immediately, because the work you would normally have to do has already been done.

example.ex: We rely quite a bit on ready-made meals — they are so convenient...
example.tran: 我们很是依赖现成食物——它们真的很方便。

example.ex: You can buy it ready-made at Chinese groceries...
example.tran: 在中国杂货店里你可以买到现成的。

entry.def: Ready-made means extremely convenient or useful for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Those wishing to study urban development have a ready-made example on their doorstep...
example.tran: 那些想要研究城市发展的人眼下就有一个十分现成的范例。

example.ex: It provides perfect strangers with a ready-made and infinitely adaptable topic of conversation.
example.tran: 它给完全陌生的人提供了一个方便灵活的聊天话题。

means.word_mean: 1. made for purchase and immediate use
2. repeated regularly without thought or originality;
